title: Stardust armor
summaries: Stardust armor is a Hardmode, post-Moon Lord set of armor that provides summon weapon boosts. It is currently the final summoner set available on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version. Crafting the full set requires a total of 36 Luminite Bars (144 Luminite) and 45 Stardust Fragments.
A full set of the Stardust armor will provide the following benefits:

• +38 defense
  • +66% summon damage
  • +5 minion capacity
  • +1 sentry capacity
  • +30% whip range
  • A unique Stardust Guardian minion will follow the wearer that does not count against the player's minion capacity. It is passive until an enemy is within a 30-tile radius from the player. It will quickly charge even through blocks towards the enemy, which it then strikes rapidly with a flurry of punches that each deal ~30 summon damage. Once there are no more hostile entities within range, the Stardust Guardian will return to following the player passively.

statistics.Set Bonus: A stardust guardian will protect you from nearby enemies
statistics.Sell: 31 GC50 SC (set)
